nodes.text: Karvus was a male Sith Lord who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War. During the Empire's invasion on Corellia, Lord Karvus was among the Sith to assist Darth Decimus in taking over the planet. When an Imperial weapons transport was shot down over the park, he led a munitions recovery team to retrieve the craft's newly-designed high-yield explosives. However, he and his team were ambushed and killed, leaving Lieutenant Ogden the only survivor.
